project.name: Payments Reliability
project.description: The Payments Reliability project aims to enhance the reliability and efficiency of digital payment solutions for SMEs in India. By optimizing our payment gateway and improving fraud detection, we will ensure a seamless payment experience while reducing operational risks.

epics.title: Payment Gateway Optimization
epics.description: Enhance the performance of our payment gateway by minimizing latency and improving the success rate of transactions. This will drive increased customer satisfaction and retention, providing a robust infrastructure for SME payment processing.

epics.title: Fraud Detection Enhancement
epics.description: Implement advanced machine learning algorithms to enhance our fraud detection capabilities. This epic aims to significantly reduce financial losses associated with fraud and improve the security of our payment transactions, fostering trust among businesses.

epics.title: System Monitoring & Alerting
epics.description: Develop a comprehensive monitoring and alerting system to detect issues in real-time. This epic will facilitate proactive incident management, thereby reducing downtime and improving overall system reliability for payments.

okrs.objective: Improve payment success rate from 95% to 98%
key_results: Optimize API request processing speed to under 200ms by 2025-07-30
Conduct post-transaction customer feedback surveys with a target of a 90% satisfaction rate by 2025-08-01
Implement new fraud detection model by 2025-07-20
Train the model on historical transaction data with a targeted accuracy of 95% by 2025-07-25
Establish a monitoring dashboard to track fraudulent attempts with a resolution ratio of 85% by 2025-08-05
Identify and resolve API bottlenecks by 2025-07-10
Implement automated monitoring and alerting procedures by 2025-07-20
Conduct weekly stress tests with a target uptime of at least 99.9% throughout the sprint
